text: People live their lives bound by what they accept as correct and true.
The only thing we're allowed to do is to believe.
A lesson without pain is meaningless.
If you don't take risks, you can't create a future.
If I don't wield the sword, I can't protect you.
In this world, there are very few people who actually trust each other.
Why is it that the beautiful things are entwined more deeply with death than with life?
I mustn't run away. I mustn't run away.
Whatever happens, happens.
Every human has their own unique way of living.
The only thing all humans are equal in is death.
People's feelings are memories that transcend time.
The only ones who should kill are those who are prepared to be killed.
No matter where you go, everyone's connected.
We are all connected to the vast network of information.
I wanted to tell you that wherever you are in the world, I will be searching for you.
The thing is, I don't really want to die. I just want the pain to stop.
September 21st, 1945... that was the night I died.
I don't know what I love means.
We found you, Menma!
Life goes on, day after day, and nothing changes.
Just being born into this world doesn't mean you can do anything you want.
I wish I could have said goodbye properly.
When you are miserable, you need something that is even more miserable than you to feel good about yourself.

anime: Now and Then, Here and There
text: If you just submit and give up, then that's the end of it.
A real hero always finds a way for justice to be served.
I would rather be a brainless monkey than a heartless monster.
If you really want to be strong, stop caring about what your surrounding thinks of you.
I don't want to conquer anything. I just think the guy with the most freedom in this whole ocean is the Pirate King!
Being the best decoy ever is as cool as being the ace.
Feel the rage. The powerful, pure rage of not being able to forgive will become your unswerving drive to take action.
Once you've met someone, you never really forget them.
A heart's a heavy burden.
To see with eyes unclouded by hate.
Trees and people used to be good friends.
Justice without power is meaningless, but power without justice is merely violence.
Are you afraid of death? Or is it life that you're afraid of?
Present day, present time.
Everyone needs a place to escape to.
Who are you? Who am I?
Don't you think dreams and the Internet are similar?
That's Mr. Kaneda to you, punk!
Kerberos is watching.
Labor is the future of mankind.
Nothing interesting ever happens here.
Those who do not understand true pain can never understand true peace.
In this world, wherever there is light, there are also shadows.
A soul needs a purpose to live and so I concluded that my purpose was to kill everyone besides myself.
In the ninja world, those who break the rules are scum, that's true, but those who abandon their friends are worse than scum.
The next generation will always surpass the previous one.
A person grows up when he's able to overcome hardships.
I'm not gonna run away, I never go back on my word! That's my nindo: my ninja way!
A real shinobi can pull a prank while flying through the air.
If you win, you live. If you lose, you die. If you don't fight, you can't win!
This world is cruel, but also very beautiful.
People who can't throw something important away, can never hope to change anything.
My soldiers, rage! My soldiers, scream! My soldiers, fight!
The future is in our hands!
I'd rather be a coward than a corpse.
Are we doing it? Now? Right here?
I'm gonna become a great soldier and make my village proud!
Nothing happened.
A cook who cannot make his captain smile has no right to be on his ship!
I don't want to be praised by someone who's hurt my friends!
I want to live!
Existence is not a crime!
What do you call a skeleton who won't fight? A coward! Wait, I don't have a spine... YOHOHOHO!
You can't bring back what you've lost, think about what you have now!
Thank you for loving me!
One Piece does exist!
Inherited Will, The Destiny of the Age, and The Dreams of the People.
It is no shame to hold a retreat when you are outnumbered.
I am the prince of all Saiyans once again!
You can take control of my mind and my body, but there is one thing a Saiyan always keeps: his pride!
I fight for those who can't fight for themselves!
I have something definite to protect. I am a Super Saiyan!
Before any creation must come destruction!
The strongest people are forged from fires of adversity.
I am the hope of the universe!
It's a terrible day for rain.
A lesson without pain is meaningless.
Even when our eyes are closed, there's a whole world out there that lives outside ourselves and our dreams.
To obtain something, something of equal value must be lost.
Nothing's perfect, the world's not perfect, but it's there for us, trying the best it can.
Revenge is just the path you took to escape your suffering.
I want it all. That's what makes me human.
I've lived my life the way I wanted to.
A tree this big wouldn't die that easily.
We fly with our spirit.
I'd rather be a pig than a fascist.
The wind is rising! We must try to live!
Life is the light that shines in the darkness!
What are we afraid of? Why do we hesitate?
There's no future for people who worship the past.
Sometimes you have to fight for the things you believe in.
We fear that which we cannot see.
I hate the way you fight. You enjoy it.
If I were rain, I wonder if I would be able to connect two people's hearts.
Red like blood, white like bone, red like solitude, white like silence.
We should not shed tears. That is a surrender of the body to the heart.
I don't know how to hold back.
We are all like fireworks: we climb, we shine and always go our separate ways.
Admiration is the emotion furthest from understanding.
It takes a mere second for treasure to turn to trash.
Being weak is nothing to be ashamed of. Staying weak is.
I do not fear death. What I fear is that my rage will fade over time.
Money can't buy life.
My greatest pleasure comes when such people crumple to their knees.
You believe I cannot pray with a single arm? A prayer comes from the heart.
You should enjoy the little detours. To the fullest.
I'm not saying this to boast, but to live for the fight means you're always prepared to die.
A true gentleman must be courageous.
Your next line is...
Yare yare daze.
What did you say about my hair?!
I, Giorno Giovanna, have a dream!
My name is Emporio. Remember my name!
You thought it was someone else, but it was me, Dio!
I have transcended humanity!
Mmm-hmm!
I want to live a modest life and die a modest death.
I'm the king of the mountain!
Those who regret their own actions, I will not let them suffer.
Ara ara, how scary.
Set your heart ablaze!
I am the god of festivals!
I am the king of demons!
Sometimes I do feel like I'm a failure. Like there's no hope for me.
I'll kill you!
It's your power, isn't it?
In order to become a hero, one must break the rules!
Let's all work hard together and laugh together again!
Call me Tsu.
It's not about winning or losing! You have no right to make her sad!
Watch me become the hero you wanted to be!
If you want to drink coffee, then let's have some coffee.
The bird fights its way out of the egg.
Both ghouls and humans are the same. We are all just bags of meat.
What's wrong isn't me, what's wrong is the world!
Jason, Jason, Jason, Jason!
The act of taking life will never be clean.
Why should I have to suffer because of what ghouls do?
Books are nice, aren't they? With just one sentence, you can get lost in all sorts of dreams.
I will become stronger!
It doesn't matter if I can't win. I have to try!
The true power of the King Engine!
Don't underestimate me!
Flowing Water Rock Smashing Fist!
I will become the ultimate evil!
I am Speed-o'-Sound Sonic!
You are strong.
I think everyone is a protagonist of their own life.
Having psychic powers doesn't make you popular with girls.
I wanted to be special too.
I am the great Dimple!
I've been living in a very small world.
It's never too late to start over.
Power is everything in this world!
Mob, you've grown so much.
Being the best decoy ever is as cool as being the ace.
Volleyball is a sport where you're always looking up.
When you get strong, I get strong too.
A setter's job is to support everyone from behind.
Fear and excitement feel pretty similar.
Sorry, sorry!
Tsukki!
Nice kill!
I want everyone to have a proper death.
I'll save people unequally.
Life isn't just about curses and death!
Throughout heaven and earth, I alone am the honored one.
Know your place, fool.
I'll destroy everything.
Salmon.
I want the confidence to say it's okay that I'm alive.
I like boobs.
Good dogs get rewarded, bad dogs get punished.
I am Power!
The future is in the past. Chainsaw Man!
I don't want to die!
I hate working.
Violence is always the answer.
Chainsaw! Chainsaw!
I'm sorry for eating you.
I'm humanity's biggest enemy.
We were just kids who didn't know anything.
I just want this to end.
I'm weak. I'm really weak.
That's exactly right!
I want to protect Gabi!
I'll kill all the devils on this island!
I am justice!
Light is my everything!
There are many types of monsters in this world.
I'll surpass L!
Humans are so interesting!
Misa, I will protect you.
I couldn't be happier to have been born into this world!
Light... you were my friend!
If I die, I can be replaced.
I'm the pilot of Eva Unit 02!
All is right with the world.
So, let's have some fun!
Maybe I was born to meet you.
Science is everything to me.
Now that's what I call a first impression!
I don't want to pilot Eva anymore.
I hope that memories of me bring you happiness.
Maybe there's only a dark road up ahead. But you still have to believe and keep going.
At what speed must I live to be able to see you again?
Walking barefoot and stepping into someone's heart.
I want you more than any blue sky!

anime: I Want to Eat Your Pancreas
text: The me inside you will live forever.
Don't forget. Don't forget me.
When you choose to live, you choose to be hurt.
Music is fun!
That's what makes it interesting!
Good morning everyone!
Nyanpasu!
Sensei! Let's play!
Daikichi, I love you!
It's delicious!

anime: March comes in like a Lion
text: I'm not alone anymore.
